item.title: AI Bias and Fairness: Why AI Gets Things Wrong
item.description: Human notices AI gave biased output. Vector explains how bias gets into AI through training data and human bias. Kai detects bias patterns in outputs. Recurse investigates who benefits from biased AI. Learn how to spot bias, why AI reflects human bias, and practical solutions.
